I had to restart Eclipse after this as the debugger would not launch anymore.
Are these all related ? Should I log seperate bugs for each ?

Created an attachment (id=32041)
Eclipse Log file

Please find the entire error log with all the debug errors and other errors reported by Eclipse.

Note that I used my 3.2M3 workspace with 3.2M4. I have had no problems in the past and after restart Eclipse is running fine.

So far it looks like a one off error.

The error is logged each time you step over a statement in Debug mode.
It clutters the log although debug continues to work.

If this is not fatal can we remove this log reporting ?

I do not remember seeing this problem in 3.2M3; must be new to 3.2M4 changes ?
I can't seem to get the disposed widegt error to happen (the other one-off errors either). Can you still reproduce this somehow?

I am not able to reproduce it consistently.

When it does happen - it happens while debug-stepping through java code.
I will monitor this and see if I can narrow this down. Must be platform/os specific issue ? 

You may choose to close this issue as, in any case, the debugger and eclipse in general continues to work fine when these bugs are dumped (which is very strange as the NPEs look quite serious).

cheers
Thanks for the update. Marking as works for me. Please re-open with steps to reproduce if it happens again.

I am still not sure how this problem occurs. Today I had a few long debug sessions and after 5 mins the debugger slows down. Each debug-step takes 2 sec to respond. The log file gets flooded with these SWT errors.  Could this I/O to the log file and exception handling be slowing the debugger down ?

Other question - did you test on a similar platform and the M4 release ?
I did not have this problem in M3. Well - I do not remember seeing it.

Could it be due to the otber supporting pkgs - did you test with same versions ?

Any feedback will be useful. So far it was not a major but the debugger is very slow for longer sessions.

Cheers.

Came across another major problem.

After a few debug sessions - application launch from ide (debug or run) hangs.
Debug view shows that the launch is waiting for a build to complete.
Progress bar animates and shows Launching 0%.

Nothing happens. No CPU activity on Eclipse. Nothing gets added to Error Log.

Tried stopping via Debug View and starting again. Same result..
Has to reboot Eclipse. Bummer.
